Azimuth.app.welcomebox:
div(
    h3(HTML("Please upload a dataset to map to the HLCA reference")),
    "Upload a counts matrix from an scRNA-seq dataset of human lung in one
        of the following formats: hdf5, rds, h5ad, h5seurat. For testing, we also provide a demo dataset of 21,080 cells from ",a("The Tabula Sapiens Consortium 2020", href="https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2021.07.19.452956v2", target="_blank")," which is loaded automatically with the 'Load demo dataset' button ",
    width = 12
  )
